# Welcome to dimtensor Discussions!

Welcome to the dimtensor community! This is the place to:

- **Ask questions** - Get help with usage, installation, or debugging
- **Share ideas** - Suggest features or improvements
- **Show and tell** - Share projects or research using dimtensor
- **Discuss** - Talk about scientific computing, units, or ML with physics

## Quick Links

- [Documentation](https://marcoloco23.github.io/dimtensor)
- [Getting Started](https://marcoloco23.github.io/dimtensor/getting-started/)
- [FAQ](https://marcoloco23.github.io/dimtensor/troubleshooting/faq/)
- [Common Errors](https://marcoloco23.github.io/dimtensor/troubleshooting/errors/)

## Before Posting

1. Check the [FAQ](https://marcoloco23.github.io/dimtensor/troubleshooting/faq/) and [docs](https://marcoloco23.github.io/dimtensor/)
2. Search existing discussions
3. For bugs, open an [issue](https://github.com/marcoloco23/dimtensor/issues) instead

## Discussion Categories

| Category | Use For |
|----------|---------|
| **Announcements** | Release notes and project updates |
| **Q&A** | Get help from the community |
| **Ideas** | Feature requests and suggestions |
| **Show and Tell** | Share your projects using dimtensor |

Looking forward to hearing from you!
